title: Missing field in ConsulConfigProcessor NoSuchFieldError: CONSUL_CONFIG
body:
### Describe the bug

consul-config 999-SNAPSHOT throws an error
```
Failed to build quarkus application: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
[ERROR]         [error]: Build step io.quarkus.consul.config.ConsulConfigProcessor#feature threw an exception: java.lang.NoSuchFieldError: CONSUL_CONFIG
```
The field is missing in source code

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

git clone https://github.com/quarkus-qe/quarkus-test-suite

cd properties
mvn clean verfiy

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK Runtime Environment AdoptOpenJDK-11.0.11+9

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

999-SNAPSHOT

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
